channel.title: Please read and help
channel.description: i have searched and done over 30 hours of research on this in the past 29 hours and did about o say 5 tuts on each and repeated them about20 times and they dont work!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! A. how do you make it so people cant register only accounts you make in folder can be played on becouse i dont like howyou can just type a username tha already exists and a password and then your account is lost in space B. how do you change how fast the xp increases(did about 12 tuts all different non work) C.Do you NEED that noip program to get your server to work can you just give your friends your server ip or your ip? thank you help would greatly greatly be appreciated. where is the client.java im ssuming its the clienthandler.java but whenever i change that and save and recompile it dosnt chnge anything so where the hell is client.java?

use whitescape source.

item.title: Please read and help

item.description:

i have searched and done over 30 hours of research on this in the past 29 hours and did about o say 5 tuts on each and repeated them about20 times and they dont work!!!
A. how do you make it so people cant register only accounts you make in folder can be played on becouse i dont like howyou can just type a username tha already exists and a password and then your account is lost in space
B. how do you change how fast the xp increases(did about 12 tuts all different non work)
C.Do you NEED that noip program to get your server to work can you just give your friends your server ip or your ip? thank you help would greatly greatly be appreciated.
where is the client.java im ssuming its the clienthandler.java but whenever i change that and save and recompile it dosnt chnge anything so where the hell is client.java?
